entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
